comment: May the POWER of coming to know the sincere heart of allow us ALL to overcome our past . May we take on His Spirit of forgiveness for ALL and ALWAYS heed the following advice : let go and let ! Ezekiel :26 & Isaiah :5
amr:
# ::snt May the POWER of coming to know the sincere heart of allow us ALL to overcome our past . May we take on His Spirit of forgiveness for ALL and ALWAYS heed the following advice : let go and let ! Ezekiel :26 & Isaiah :5
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (w / wish-01
                  :ARG1 (p / power-01
                        :ARG0 (c / come-04
                              :ARG1 (w2 / we
                                    :mod (a2 / all))
                              :ARG2 (k / know-02
                                    :ARG0 w2
                                    :ARG1 (h / heart
                                          :mod (s / sincere)
                                          :ARG0-of (a3 / allow-01
                                                :ARG1 (o / overcome-01
                                                      :ARG0 w2
                                                      :ARG1 (p2 / past
                                                            :poss w2))))))))
            :op2 (w3 / wish-01
                  :ARG1 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (t / take-on-09
                              :ARG0 w2
                              :ARG1 (s2 / Spirit
                                    :poss (h2 / he)
                                    :topic (f / forgive-01
                                          :ARG0 h2
                                          :ARG1 w2)))
                        :op2 (h3 / heed-01
                              :ARG0 w2
                              :ARG1 (a5 / advise-01
                                    :ARG0 h2
                                    :ARG1 w2
                                    :ARG2 (a6 / and
                                          :op1 (l / let-01
                                                :mode imperative
                                                :ARG0 w2
                                                :ARG1 (g / go-01
                                                      :ARG1 w2))
                                          :op2 (l2 / let-01
                                                :mode imperative
                                                :ARG0 w2))
                                    :ARG1-of (f2 / follow-04))
                              :time (a7 / always))))
            :snt2 (a8 / and
                  :op1 (v / verse
                        :mod 26
                        :part-of (c2 / chapter
                              :part-of (b / book
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Ezekiel"))))
                  :op2 (v2 / verse
                        :mod 5
                        :part-of (b2 / book
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Isaiah"))))))

comment: If one ask me to pray , don't ask me what I am praying . Pray in your closet ! or are you looking for praise among men !
amr:
# ::snt If one ask me to pray , don't ask me what I am praying . Pray in your closet ! or are you looking for praise among men !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / ask-01
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG1-of (p / pray-01
                        :ARG0 (ii / i)))
            :ARG2 ii
            :condition (a2 / ask-01
                  :ARG0 (o / one)
                  :ARG1 (p2 / pray-01
                        :ARG0 ii)
                  :ARG2 ii))
      :snt2 (o2 / or
            :op1 (p3 / pray-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :location (c / closet
                        :poss y2))
            :op2 (l / look-04
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (p4 / praise-01
                        :ARG0 (m2 / man))
                  :polarity (a3 / amr-unknown))))
